chapters.title: Chapter 20:  The Golden Crane
chapters.info:
Weilin Aldragoran,
      p. 433â€”Seller of gems, rare woods, furs, finely-made swords, and
      armor in Saldaea.  He is Malkieri, and still wears the hadori.
      He was a toddler when Malkier was overrun.
      See also
      Aldragoran, Alida.
